title: Displaying word into the screen
description: In this task you will have to write any word into the screen, and that will be the first web page that you'll create
hint: In index.html file body section just type any word

title: Displaying two words in different lines
description: In this task you will get to know html tags.
hint: In index.html file body section create 2 div wrappers and add some words inside it
